title: New ACEs and BCEs Announced
text:
New ACEs and BCEs Announced ESA announced the latest PMPs who earned ACE, ACE-I, or BCE credentials. September 21, 2015 
ESA announced the latest PMPs who earned ACE, ACE-I, or BCE credentials. New ACEs: Christopher Mosley, ACE, (Terminix), Meridian, MS USA. Certified on 8/4/2015. John Matthew Zehner, Jr., ACE, (Alpha Ecological Pest Control), Vancouver, WA USA. Certified on 8/26/2015. James Michaelson Truslow, ACE, (BASF Corp.), Grass Valley, CA USA. Certified on 8/27/2015. Robert A. Ostrop, ACE, (Invader Pest Management), Glendale, AZ USA. Certified on 9/10/2015. Greg Epley, ACE, (Food Protection Services), Memphis, TN USA. Certified on 9/14/2015. Peter Brigden, ACE-I, (Rapid Training), Stafford, QLD, Australia. Certified on 8/10/2015. Ryan Frawley, ACE-I, (Active Pest Solutions LTD), Edmonton, AB Canada. Certified on 8/26/2015. Shakeel Iqbal, ACE-I, (STERITECH), Milton, ON Canada. Certified on 8/28/2015. Elizabeth H Foley, BCE, (United States Air Force), Beavercreek, OH USA. Certified on 7/24/2015. Karen (Kim) Kelley-Tunis, ACE, BCE, (Rollins, Inc.), Atlanta, GA USA. Certified on 7/31/2015. Craig A. Stoops, BCE, (United States Navy), DPO, AA USA. Certified on 8/12/2015. Amanda Rose Newton, BCE, (North Georgia College and State University), Leesburg, VA USA. Certified on 8/12/2015. Daniel W Scott, BCE, (JC Ehrlich/Western Exterminator Co.), Anaheim, CA USA. Certified on 9/3/2015. Learn more about ESA's ACE, ACE-I, or BCE program at http://www.entocert.org/ace-certification . NPMAâ€™s Fredericks Featured on The Weather Channel September 21, 2015
